Description:
Open a handle on the drive volume via the \\.\ DOS device path specifier and perform direct access read of the first few bytes of the volume.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious IO.FileStream
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%new-object%' and scriptblocktext like '%io.filestream%' and scriptblocktext like '%\\\\.\\%')
